description:
This Masala Chai blend begins with a hint of cinnamon, black pepper and turmeric to stimulate and delight the palate followed with the rich, malty notes known and loved from Assam tea with a kick of ginger that leaves you wanting more.

This bundle includes 3 x packs of 20 pyramid tea bags featuring our signature Masala Chai.

The Organic Tea Project's Masala Chai was one of our first blends they created to remind us of their daily tea fix in India. It offers a pure organic chai drinking experience, with a punchy hit of traditional masala spices that is balanced with rich malty Assam tea.

 

FLAVOUR

Spicy and malty

STRENGTH

Medium - Strong

BREAKFAST TEA INGREDIENTS

Organic Assam whole leaf tea, cardamom, cinnamon, ginger, cloves, star anise, black peppercorns & turmeric
name: The Organic Tea Project 60EACH
